Log email to HubSpot

Dear valued partners,

 

I would like to share below request with you regarding the opportunity for students to volunteer at the SAF congress in Amsterdam on May 7th and 8th. Please feel free to forward this to any students that may be interested in having the opportunity to engage with the sector on sustainable aviation. Interested students can contact jamie.dowswell@safcongress.com

 

I wanted to reach out as we are looking for 4-5 capable and smart young volunteers to assist onsite at the SAF Congress

 

The volunteer positions are usually extended to students or interns and will include a free pass to attend the Main Conference Days on 7-8 May. It’s a great opportunity to learn about everything SAF and decarbonisation in aviation, as well as connect with the companies working in the space.

 

The roles and responsibilities include:

Assisting with ensuring speakers are prepared and ready for their sessions in each stream
Assisting in guiding attendees in the right direction to streams (we have a much bigger venue this year!)
Assisting with AV / microphones in the room
(Optional) Writing or preparing summaries of the streams in which they are joining which we can share with attendees afterwards

 

We would ask they meet us onsite at the Beurs on the morning of the 7th at 7AM and dress in smart / business attire (i.e. suit with no tie or chinos and shirt for men).

 

 

 

Best,

Vincent de Haes

To70 | Senior Consultant, Sustainable Aviation

Hi Vincent,

 

How are you doing? Looking forward to catching up in a couple of weeks

 

I wanted to reach out as we are looking for 4-5 capable and smart young volunteers to assist onsite at the SAF Congress and I remembered you were involved in the Young NAG.

 

The volunteer positions are usually only extended to students or interns and will include a free pass to attend the Main Conference Days on 7-8 May. It’s a great opportunity to learn about everything SAF and decarbonisation in aviation, as well as connect with the companies working in the space.

 

The roles and responsibilities include:

Assisting with ensuring speakers are prepared and ready for their sessions in each stream
Assisting in guiding attendees in the right direction to streams (we have a much bigger venue this year!)
Assisting with AV / microphones in the room
(Optional) Writing or preparing summaries of the streams in which they are joining which we can share with attendees afterwards

 

We would ask they meet us onsite at the Beurs on the morning of the 7th at 7AM and dress in smart / business attire (i.e. suit with no tie or chinos and shirt for men).

 

Do you have any members who might be interested in volunteering at the congress?

 

Kind regards,

 

Jamie Dowswell

Managing Director, Sustainable Aviation Futures
